name: ReverseMovie
0:
”Alexa, open reverse movie”
”Alexa, start reverse movie”
”Alexa, launch reverse movie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reverse movie
des:
Tried ever to watch a movie backwards? Of course you can’t. But wish you could. Then you would get hilarious results. Reverse movie gives you the plot of a movie as if the movie occurred reverse, that is, the movie plot is reversed and you need to guess the movie. 

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
